text.body:
Dear Hansie,
Congratulations to you and your team on having completed a successful tour of the subcontinent.
We watched with admiration as you won the Test series against Pakistan and came through undefeated in the Jubilee Quadrangular Tournament to a stunning victory.
We would also ask you to extend our congratulations to the Pakistani Cricket Board for having mounted such a successful sporting commemoration of the fiftieth anniversary of Pakistan's independence.
You and the team have done South Africa proud!
Groete en beste wense!
